Key Match Events: Rodrigo Bentancur scored the opening goal for Uruguay in the 8th minute.
Ismaël Koné scored an incredible goal for Canada in the 22nd minute.
Jonathan David scored to put Canada ahead in the 80th minute.
Luis Suárez scored a stoppage-time equalizer for Uruguay in the 90+2 minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Jesse Marsch and Canada should hold their heads high after challenging several of the best teams in the world en route to a fourth-place finish.
Ismaël Koné was the best player on the pitch despite missing a pivotal penalty in the shootout.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Suárez's goal in what could be his final match for Uruguay.
Alphonso Davies missed the final penalty for Canada, hitting the crossbar.
